comment: My phone is samsung galaxy a52s 5g and on my phone on tiktok some filters doesnt look the same as it looks on iPhones. On my phone they're all messed up and sometimes when i turn filter on my screen where i record got blured. I dont have option to save video but without the tiktok sing. Also i dont have some other options as other phones.. please my phone is from 2021 its not that old can you please update that mine phone amd other have new update ?
key sentence: The user does not have the option to save videos without the TikTok watermark.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to record and enhance videos, adjust playback speed, add effects, sound, text, music, and post videos.
